stories.Title: It's the Gemini era
stories.Description: If you haven't caught up with the news yet, discover all about Gemini: Google's groundbreaking AI model. Designed for multimodality and optimized for different sizes and tasks, it is transforming AI.
stories.Tweet: It's the Gemini era 📦 If you haven't caught up with the news yet, discover all about Gemini: Google's groundbreaking AI model. Designed for multimodality and optimized for different sizes and tasks, it is transforming AI. #google https://deepmind.google/technologies/gemini/#introduction

stories.Title: Everything you can Imagine
stories.Description: Meta is forging ahead with more AI advancements. The newest development is Imagine, an image generator driven by its Emu model, turning text prompts into creative visuals.
stories.Tweet: Everything you can Imagine 📦 Meta is forging ahead with more AI advancements. The newest development is Imagine, an image generator driven by its Emu model, turning text prompts into creative visuals. #ai https://www.engadget.com/metas-ai-image-generator-is-available-as-a-standalone-website-185953058.html

stories.Title: Late for the party?
stories.Description: Apple has discreetly announced an open-source ML framework for Apple silicon called MLX. However, the company needs a bolder approach if it wants to catch up with competitors on AI.
stories.Tweet: Late for the party? 📦 Apple has discreetly announced an open-source ML framework for Apple silicon called MLX. However, the company needs a bolder approach if it wants to catch up with competitors on AI. #apple https://gizmodo.com/apple-ai-mlx-stage-openai-chatgpt-google-gemini-1851080108

stories.Title: May the best win
stories.Description: Gemini will be a part of the Pixel 8 Pro, drawing parallels with Apple's Siri. As Google sets the stage for a new era of smartphone AI, should Apple get its act together and amplify its efforts?
stories.Tweet: May the best win 📦 Gemini will be a part of the Pixel 8 Pro, drawing parallels with Apple's Siri. As Google sets the stage for a new era of smartphone AI, should Apple get its act together and amplify its efforts? #ai https://www.fastcompany.com/90994058/gemini-ai-android-google-apple

stories.Title: Better chips for better training
stories.Description: AMD has unveiled the Instinct MI300X accelerator and Instinct M1300A APU. These powerful AI chips are tailored to meet the demands of LLMs, boasting enhanced memory and energy efficiency.
stories.Tweet: Better chips for better training 📦 AMD has unveiled the Instinct MI300X accelerator and Instinct M1300A APU. These powerful AI chips are tailored to meet the demands of LLMs, boasting enhanced memory and energy efficiency. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/12/6/23991113/amd-ai-mi300-chips-generative-gpu

stories.Title: To the rescue
stories.Description: After Bard fell short of meeting audience expectations, perhaps the integration of Gemini will be the upgrade the chatbot needs to finally position itself in the AI spotlight.
stories.Tweet: To the rescue 📦 After Bard fell short of meeting audience expectations, perhaps the integration of Gemini will be the upgrade the chatbot needs to finally position itself in the AI spotlight. #google https://venturebeat.com/ai/google-pins-its-hopes-on-gemini-ai-to-redeem-troubled-assistant-bard/

stories.Title: A key maneuver
stories.Description: As SpaceX gears up for the third Starship test, they're also planning to perform an in-flight propellant transfer, a key step that holds immense potential for NASA's lunar roadmap.
stories.Tweet: A key maneuver 📦 As SpaceX gears up for the third Starship test, they're also planning to perform an in-flight propellant transfer, a key step that holds immense potential for NASA's lunar roadmap. #spacex https://gizmodo.com/spacex-test-in-flight-fuel-transfer-third-starship-nasa-1851077135

stories.Title: The stars and beyond
stories.Description: India's continuous success in its space ambitions has only broadened the country's interest in knowledge and exploration. Among its visionary plans is the establishment of a moon base by 2050.
stories.Tweet: The stars and beyond 📦 India's continuous success in its space ambitions has only broadened the country's interest in knowledge and exploration. Among its visionary plans is the establishment of a moon base by 2050. #space https://www.space.com/india-moon-base-2047

stories.Title: Generative AI for developers
stories.Description: GitHub has been exploring how to enhance developers' experience with AI for a while. The experiments, learnings, and key principles are the driving force behind GitHub Copilot.
stories.Tweet: Generative AI for developers 📦 GitHub has been exploring how to enhance developers' experience with AI for a while. The experiments, learnings, and key principles are the driving force behind GitHub Copilot. #github https://github.blog/2023-12-06-how-were-experimenting-with-llms-to-evolve-github-copilot/

stories.Title: Time to swap
stories.Description: Stellantis has partnered with Ample to push forward battery swapping in the EV industry. The collaboration aims to power a fleet of Fiat 500e vehicles in Spain, offering convenience for users.
stories.Tweet: Time to swap 📦 Stellantis has partnered with Ample to push forward battery swapping in the EV industry. The collaboration aims to power a fleet of Fiat 500e vehicles in Spain, offering convenience for users. #stellantis https://www.theverge.com/2023/12/7/23991923/stellantis-ample-ev-battery-swap-deal-fiat-500e-spain

title: All about Gemini, Meta unveils Imagine, Apple's AI efforts
description: Google keeps surprising us, and Gemini is here to shake up the AI game for good. Like, it will even make Bard better! Meta, on the other hand, promised AI in everything, and they're delivering, including an image generator with an imaginative name. And, as an Apple fan, I've always wondered why they play it safe with artificial intelligence, but who knows, maybe they're just reserving the best for last.
